description: Number of cyclic binary n-bit strings with no alternating substring of length >2.
comments: _John W. Layman_ observes that the second differences give the sequence shifted to the right.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
